creditline: Gift of the Fargo Hebrew Congregation
description: tan velvet body, lined with white satin; stuffed crown over pair of stuffed tablets, flanked by lightly stuffed rampant lions; scrolls and vine with rhinestones near bottom; Hebrew text embroidered throughout front; undecorated back
dimension: 24 1/2 x 17 1/4 x 7 in. (62.23 x 43.82 x 17.78 cm) (without fringe)
inscription:
Inscription

on bottom edge, embroidered in gold:  [IN MEMORY OF MRS. ABE JOLOSKY]
medium: Cloth, metallic braid and threads, rhinestones, sequins, metal studs; needlework
title: Torah Mantle
